title: Bug 32286: ControlExample Button Tab changing styles resets button orientation

Bug 32286: ControlExample Button Tab changing styles resets button orientation. Ensure that Eclipse is not running. Accept new configuration defaults.

OB:
Problem Description: When using the Button controls from the SWT Controls example, if SWT.ARROW buttons are used and the SWT.BORDER property is selected or deselected, the arrow alignment property of all the arrow buttons is reset to UP.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. A new SWT Controls view appears.
5. The arrow buttons will change their orientation.
8. The arrows will change their orientation back to "up".

EB: To reproduce the issue, select or deselect the SWT.BORDER option in the styles group.
